name: Fulton County, Georgia - Open Data
description: Open data portal containing datasets related to Fulton County, Georgia, including tax parcels, city limits, census, and LiDAR surveys.

data_themes.dataset_description: Boundary of each parcel of land in Fulton County for real property appraisal
Parcels in Johns Creek, GA as originally drawn and attributed by Fulton County Tax Assessors, but with topology corrected by Johns Creek GIS
Legal boundary information for the City of Johns Creek, Georgia

data_themes.dataset_title: TIGER/Line Shapefile, 2023, County, Fulton County, GA
data_themes.dataset_description: TIGER/Line shapefiles and related database files (.dbf) from the U.S. Census Bureau for Fulton County
Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) LAS dataset covering Fulton County, Georgia
